StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
A diligent, result-oriented & accomplished professional, offering over 1 year of experience Currently working with Tata Consultancy Services, Hyderabad as Business & Data Analyst - IT; working on Qlik Sense analytical tool; working on major project British Telecommunication
Successfully performed data analysis of key problem areas to assist in root cause analysis; audited data regularly to ensure data integrity & quality Skillfully managed documents for streamlining systems to facilitate achievement of organizational objectives & ensure profitability of operations Proficiently saved time & defects by ensuring maintenance, back up and security of data architecture, process & governance Conducted internal control reviews on key processes of operations, providing recommendation to enhance the quality of internal processes and procedures Exhibited excellence in spearheading the entire transition operations right from scratch including process stabilization

PositionHistory.Title: Business & Data Analyst - IT

o SQL to fetch data from master table & merge in another table, to fetch data from different tables on certain conditions Maintaining the track of certain jobs to be completed by person Addressing & resolving issue if any order is not progressing & contact certain person for its progression
Assisting in creating policies & procedures regarding collating & analyzing data; developing new data analysis processes Critically evaluating and screening data, plus profiling to identify any issues; assessing analytics on an ongoing basis Monitoring the data warehouse, including the collection & utilization of all data Extending knowledge of Business Intelligence to provide ongoing refinement of processes to improve operations Reviewing & suggesting suitable improvements in data models; enforcing data modelling standards, best practices in the design
Significant Achievements: Prepared reports based on research conducted and made important suggestions on investments for companies as well as individuals Provided support through market analysis, forecasting, and reporting to the aligned internal business unit

Tata Consultancy Services as Business & Data Analyst - IT Jul 2018 to Till Date Hello Everyon,
Currently I am a business analyst. Let me explain you more about my profile. I am fetching data from Oracle OBIEE / MsSql and analyzing them and preparing bill sheet. Fetching data from different systems and analyzing the data and generating insights from that analysis. I know QlikSense which is a data visualization tool. Using Qliksense, dashboard is prepared. Having handson in Excel work and preparing reports. And having knowledge of Python Language. I am a quick learner and always try to fulfill the expectations.
Thank you, ~~~~~~
Education UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computers) from Banasthali University in 2018

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:CoverLetterText:
Hello Everyon,
Currently I am a business analyst. Let me explain you more about my profile. I am fetching data from Oracle OBIEE / MsSql and analyzing them and preparing bill sheet. Fetching data from different systems and analyzing the data and generating insights from that analysis. I know QlikSense which is a data visualization tool. Using Qliksense, dashboard is prepared. Having handson in Excel work and preparing reports. And having knowledge of Python Language. I am a quick learner and always try to fulfill the expectations.
Thank you,
